items.title: Frontend Developer @SiSC - Sindicatul Studenților din Cibernetică
description: • Creating and updating applications / sites of internal and external projects using HTML, CSS and JavaScript;
• Resolving bugs of internal and external applications / sites;
• Explaining the functionality and use of applications / sites for members of other departments;
• Adaptation on various frameworks, depending on the chosen project;
• Loading materials created on GitLab;
• Connecting the Front-end with the Back-end via APIs;

items.title: Solutions Architect @MLSA ASE
description: • Finding the best tech solution among all possible to solve the existing business problems.
• Describing the structure, characteristics, behavior, and other aspects of software to project stakeholders.
• Defining features, phases, and solution requirements.
• Providing specifications according to which the solution is defined, managed, and delivered.
• Focused mainly on web technologies.

items.title: Technology Member @Microsoft Learn Student Ambassadors Romania ASE
description: • Creating and updating internal and external applications and the site using both Front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap) and Back-end technologies (Asp.net, .net, C#);
• Resolving the bugs of internal and external applications and the site;
• Explaining the functionality and use of applications / sites for members of other departments;
• Loading materials created on GitHub.

items.title: Project Manager Dare to Speak @SiSC
description: • Coordinates the activities within the project, directly supervising the association's teams.
• Makes proposals to improve the work style in order to maximize the efficiency of achieving the proposed objectives.
• Evaluates the impact of the project and communicates it to the management, financiers and project partners.
• Monitors in time the progress achieved towards the proposed objectives and writes reports every 2 weeks to the executive office, the management office and the department leaders.

items.title: Computer Science Teacher @Dalia's Book
description: • Introducing elementary school students to algorithms through education.
• Developing and evaluating a curriculum that aligns with students' learning progression.
• Evaluates the impact of the project and communicates it to the management, financiers and project partners.
• Evaluating and assisting students with their project presentations through testing.
